Fundamentals of scRNASeq Analysis Xinyi Lin, Gordon Qian, Joshua Ho 2021-06-28 (updated: 2021-06-30) Prerequisites This is the teaching material for Session 2: Fundamentals of scRNASeq Analysis of 2021 Single Cell Workshop. Some packages used in this material can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown")
